heading_link_launcher: Link Mod Launcher to Patreon Account
why_link: Linking your Patreon Account to the mod launcher will allow you to gain access to your Patreon only features such as accessing mods early.
already_linked: Your mod launcher is already linked.
how_to_get_code: Open your web browser and visit <0>AzzaMods.com</0> and access the <0>Link Patreon Account</0> section to get your link code.
restricted_mod_launcher: This page should only be accessed from within the Mod Launcher.
first_enter_code: You need to enter a link code first.
err_unknown: An unknown error occurred while linking your account.
